contained.name: as_hierarchy
contained.title: as_hierarchy
contained.description: Hierarchical equivalent of the physical representation of each subtype, compatible with CEN EN 13606 structures.

name: DATA_STRUCTURE
title: DATA_STRUCTURE
description: Abstract parent class of all data structure types. Includes the `_as_hierarchy_` function which can generate the equivalent CEN EN13606 single hierarchy for each subtype's physical representation. For example, the physical representation of an `ITEM_LIST` is `List<ELEMENT>`; its implementation of `_as_hierarchy_` will generate a `CLUSTER` containing the set of `ELEMENT` nodes from the list.

element.short: Abstract parent class of all data structure types.
element.definition: Abstract parent class of all data structure types. Includes the `_as_hierarchy_` function which can generate the equivalent CEN EN13606 single hierarchy for each subtype's physical representation. For example, the physical representation of an `ITEM_LIST` is `List<ELEMENT>`; its implementation of `_as_hierarchy_` will generate a `CLUSTER` containing the set of `ELEMENT` nodes from the list.
